title: 1916 Shoeless Joe #86 'holmes to homes milk-made bread' card?
author: rojo

posts.post_title: 1916 Shoeless Joe #86 'holmes to homes milk-made bread' card?
posts.post_content:
Does anyone know anything about this card? I've only seen one, and it was  advertised as a reprint, which, for some intuitive reason, I don't believe it was. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
Roger
I think you need to post this thread in the forum section. Just trying to be helpful.
I am pretty sure a board member bought it but I can't remember who.
